languages.text: "Среди верующих произошел раскол — хоть многие и называют это чудом, ниспосланным самим Императором, и желают поскорее пристроить Блаженных к делу, часть населения пугают эти безвольные порождения древней машины. Они требуют, чтобы ученые мужи вмешались в великое ваяние и нашли способ остановить производство Блаженных".

"There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."
languages.original_text: "Среди верующих произошел раскол — хоть многие и называют это чудом, ниспосланным самим Императором, и желают поскорее пристроить Блаженных к делу, часть населения пугают эти безвольные порождения древней машины. Они требуют, чтобы ученые мужи вмешались в великое ваяние и нашли способ остановить производство Блаженных".

traits.locale_text: "There is a split among the believers — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor himself, and want to quickly put the Blessed to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures borne of the ancient machine. They demand that the pundits should intervene in the great sculpting, and find a way to stop the production of the Blessed."

"There is a split among the believers — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor himself, and want to quickly put the Blessed to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures borne of the ancient machine. They demand that the pundits should intervene in the great sculpting, and find a way to stop the production of the Blessed."

"There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

languages.text: “信徒之间出现了意见分歧。尽管许多人认为，这是帝皇亲自送来的奇迹，希望让受召者迅速投入工作，但仍有一部分人害怕这些从古代机器中产生的无魂生物。他们要求行星上的饱学之士介入伟大的塑造过程，想办法停止制造受召者。”
languages.original_text: "There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

traits.locale_text: “信徒之间出现了意见分歧。尽管许多人认为，这是帝皇亲自送来的奇迹，希望让受召者迅速投入工作，但仍有一部分人害怕这些从古代机器中产生的无魂生物。他们要求行星上的饱学之士介入伟大的塑造过程，想办法停止制造受召者。”
“信徒之间出现了意见分歧。尽管许多人认为，这是帝皇亲自送来的奇迹，希望让受召者迅速投入工作，但仍有一部分人害怕这些从古代机器中产生的无魂生物。他们要求行星上的饱学之士介入伟大的塑造过程，想办法停止制造受召者。”

languages.text: «Hay división entre los fieles: aunque muchos lo consideran un milagro del propio Emperador y quieren poner rápidamente a trabajar a los Tocados, una parte de la población está atemorizada por estas criaturas sin alma nacidas de la antigua máquina. Exigen que los sabios del planeta intervengan en la gran escultura y encuentren la forma de detener la producción de los Tocados».
languages.original_text: "There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

traits.locale_text: «Hay división entre los fieles: aunque muchos lo consideran un milagro del propio Emperador y quieren poner rápidamente a trabajar a los Tocados, una parte de la población está atemorizada por estas criaturas sin alma nacidas de la antigua máquina. Exigen que los sabios del planeta intervengan en la gran escultura y encuentren la forma de detener la producción de los Tocados».

languages.text: 「信者の間で分裂が生じています...多くの信者は、それを皇帝自身が送った奇跡と呼び、触れられし者をすぐに働かせようとするものの、一部の信者は、古代の機械から生まれた魂の欠落した生物に怯えています。彼らはこの惑星の学識ある者に、この偉大なる彫刻に介入し、触れられし者の生産を止める方法を探すように要求しています」
languages.original_text: "There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

traits.locale_text: 「信者の間で分裂が生じています...多くの信者は、それを皇帝自身が送った奇跡と呼び、触れられし者をすぐに働かせようとするものの、一部の信者は、古代の機械から生まれた魂の欠落した生物に怯えています。彼らはこの惑星の学識ある者に、この偉大なる彫刻に介入し、触れられし者の生産を止める方法を探すように要求しています」
「信者の間で分裂が生じています...多くの信者は、それを皇帝自身が送った奇跡と呼び、触れられし者をすぐに働かせようとするものの、一部の信者は、古代の機械から生まれた魂の欠落した生物に怯えています。彼らはこの惑星の学識ある者に、この偉大なる彫刻に介入し、触れられし者の生産を止める方法を探すように要求しています」

languages.text: « Les croyants sont partagés ; si beaucoup louent un miracle accompli par l'Empereur en personne et veulent rapidement mettre les Altérés au travail, une partie de la population est terrorisée par les créatures sans âme nées de l'antique machine. Ils demandent aux érudits de la planète d'interférer dans le grand œuvre afin de trouver un moyen d'empêcher leur reproduction. »
languages.original_text: "There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

traits.locale_text: « Les croyants sont partagés ; si beaucoup louent un miracle accompli par l'Empereur en personne et veulent rapidement mettre les Altérés au travail, une partie de la population est terrorisée par les créatures sans âme nées de l'antique machine. Ils demandent aux érudits de la planète d'interférer dans le grand œuvre afin de trouver un moyen d'empêcher leur reproduction. »

languages.text: "Unter den Gläubigen herrscht Uneinigkeit. Manche sehen darin ein Wunder, das der Imperator Selbst geschickt hat, und wollen die Berührten schnell einsetzen. Einem Teil der Bevölkerung machen diese aus einer uralten Maschine geborenen seelenlosen Kreaturen aber auch Angst. Sie fordern, dass die Gelehrten des Planeten sich in die große Formgebung einmischen und einen Weg finden, die Produktion der Berührten aufzuhalten."
languages.original_text: "There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."

Sie fordern, dass die Gelehrten des Planeten sich in die große Formgebung einmischen und einen Weg finden, die Produktion der Berührten aufzuhalten."

Sie fordern, dass die Gelehrten des Planeten sich in die große Formgebung einmischen und einen Weg finden, die Produktion der Berührten aufzuhalten."

languages.text: "İnançlılar arasında görüş ayrılığı yaşanıyor. Birçoğu, bunu bizzat İmparator Hazretleri tarafından gönderilen bir mucize olarak görüp Mütehassisleri hemen iş başına koşmayı istese de nüfusun bir kısmı, kadim makineden doğan bu ruhsuz yaratıklardan ürkmüş hâlde. Gezegendeki yüce şekillendirmede bilgili insanların müdahale etmelerini ve Mütehassis üretimini durdurmanın bir yolunu bulmalarını talep ediyorlar."
languages.original_text: "There is a split among the faithful — though many call it a miracle sent by the Emperor Himself and want to quickly put the Touched to work, a part of the population is frightened by these soulless creatures born from the ancient machine. They demand that the planet's learned men intervene in the great sculpting and find a way to stop the production of the Touched."
